attributes.action: Remove Max Mosley as President of the FIA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Max Mosley has shown that his Presidency of the FIA has been unfair and draconian.

McLaren having recieved an unprecedented fine and yet Renault recieve nothing for what appears to all as at least the same offence.

Max Mosley's bias against ANY team must be stopped and the only sensible option would be for him to resign.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
